virtualmachine
Class Hypervisor

java.lang.Object
  virtualmachine.Hypervisor
Direct Known Subclasses:
HypervisorFactory.VoidHypervisor, VMwarePlayer, VMwareWorkstation
public abstract class Hypervisor
extends java.lang.Object

This class is an abstract class to be implemented by each hypervisor. It must be only instantiated by the hyperviso factory

          Path to this hypervisor executable
private  java.lang.String virtualMachinePath
          Path to this hypervisor managed vitual machine

preconfigureVirtualMachine

public abstract void preconfigureVirtualMachine(int coreNumber,
                                                int ramSize,
                                                java.lang.String persistent)
                                         throws HypervisorOperationException
Configures the managed virtual machine with the given core number, ram size and persistent properties

Parameters:
coreNumber - the core number to configure the virtual machine
ramSize - the ram size to configure the virtual machine
persistent - The persistent property
Throws:
HypervisorOperationException - if there is an error configuring the virtual machine settings

turnOnVirtualMachine

public abstract void turnOnVirtualMachine()
                                   throws HypervisorOperationException
Turn on the managed virtual machine

Throws:
HypervisorOperationException - if there is an error starting up the virtual machine

turnOnVirtualMachine

public final void turnOnVirtualMachine(int coreNumber,
                                       int ramSize,
                                       java.lang.String persistant)
                                throws HypervisorOperationException
Configures the settings for this managed virtual machine and the starts it. It just call preconfigureVirtualMachine method and turnOffVirtualMachine;

Parameters:
coreNumber - the core number to configure the virtual machine
ramSize - the ram size to configure the virtual machine
persistent - The persistent property
Throws:
HypervisorOperationException - if there is an error configuring the virtual machine settings or starting it

turnOffVirtualMachine

public abstract void turnOffVirtualMachine()
                                    throws HypervisorOperationException
turns off the managed virtual machine

Throws:
HypervisorOperationException - If there is an error stoping the virtual machine

restartVirtualMachine

public abstract void restartVirtualMachine()
                                    throws HypervisorOperationException
Restarts the managed virtual machine

Throws:
HypervisorOperationException - If there is an error restating the virtual machine

executeCommandOnMachine

public abstract void executeCommandOnMachine(java.lang.String user,
                                             java.lang.String pass,
                                             java.lang.String command)
                                      throws HypervisorOperationException
Executes a command on the managed virtual machine

Parameters:
user - the operating system privileged user name that is going to execute the command
pass - the operating system privileged user password that is going to execute the command
command - The command to be executed
Throws:
HypervisorOperationException - If there is an error executing the command

copyFileOnVirtualMachine

public abstract void copyFileOnVirtualMachine(java.lang.String user,
                                              java.lang.String pass,
                                              java.lang.String destinationRoute,
                                              java.io.File sourceFile)
                                       throws HypervisorOperationException
writes a file on the virtual machine file system

Parameters:
user - the operating system privileged user name that is going to write the file
pass - the operating system privileged user password that is going to write the file
destinationRoute - the route on the virtual machine file system where the file is going to be writen
sourceFile - The local file that contains the content of the copied file
Throws:
HypervisorOperationException - If there is an error copying the file

getInstance

protected abstract Hypervisor getInstance()
Returns an instance for this hypervisor class

Returns:
an instance for this hypervisor class
